SA15ratksanu:5: santaś cāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:10: (77.11) yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam /
SA15ratksanu:12: na vidyete cākṣaṇikasya kramākramāv iti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:19: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād /
SA15ratksanu:20: bhāvino 'pi kāryasya karaṇaprasaṅge kathaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇe kramāntarāvakāśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:26: (77.20) tad ayam akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramābhāvalakṣaṇo hetur nāsiddho vaktavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:32: (78.3) yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvād vidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā,
SA15ratksanu:34: na hi dahanādinā dhūmāder vyāptisādhakapramāṇād aparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtam asti /
SA15ratksanu:35_0: tasmād vidhyor eva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇam abhāvayor api vyāptisādhakam iti nyāyasya
SA15ratksanu:35_1: duratikramatvāt sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ity anavadyo
SA15ratksanu:36: tad ayam akṣaṇikād vinivartamāṇaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartya kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy anavadyā. /
SA15ratksanu:39: tathā hi na tāvad ayaṃ prasaṅga hetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:47: pratītir hi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
SA15ratksanu:48: (79.1) prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānupalambhaś ca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:50: (79.4) antimapakṣe tu na kaścid dhetur anāśrayaḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:52: (79.6) api ca, tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
SA15ratksanu:62: (79.11) pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvad pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:63: akṣaṇikātmanaḥ sarvadaiva tvanmate 'pratyakṣatvāt na cānumānatas tadabhāvas tatpratibaddhaliṅgān upalam bhādityāśrayāsiddhis tāvad uddhatā /
SA15ratksanu:68: tathā hi kramisahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryakāritvan tāvad aviruddham /
SA15ratksanu:72: na ca tayor āvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyān tadvataḥ kā cit kṣatiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:78: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram,
SA15ratksanu:79: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvopapatter aśakyaṃ bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam anyonyatvam upapādayitum iti /
SA15ratksanu:82: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryād iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:83: (79.26) tad idaṃ mātā me vandhyety ādivat svavacanavirodhād ayuktam /
SA15ratksanu:84: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA15ratksanu:86: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
SA15ratksanu:88: nanv ayam akṣaṇikaḥ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati /
SA15ratksanu:89: tac cāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣiva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe sad iti tadāpi janayet /
SA15ratksanu:90: akurvan vā tṛtīyādiṣv api na kurvīta /
SA15ratksanu:93: (80.4) atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva /
SA15ratksanu:97: tathaiva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ sampratipatter iti na kramikāryakāritvapakṣoktadoṣāvasaraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:99: ye hi kāryam utpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣās teṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye 'nuvartamāneṣv api teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthād ūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
SA15ratksanu:101: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmi niṣpatter ārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:106: na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko 'py ayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:107: na hi kramākramābhyām anyasya prakārasyābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:110: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇām iti na kramākramābhyām arthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:112: (80.19) kiṃ ca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvam api parokṣam eveti na tāvat pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:115: (80.22) api ca kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam ity atisubhāṣitam /
SA15ratksanu:118: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptim iti tu bruvatā vyāpter evābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
SA15ratksanu:119: na hi bhavaty agnir dhūmabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti /
SA15ratksanu:121: (80.26) api ca kim idaṃ bādhakam akṣaṇikānām asattāṃ sādhayati /
SA15ratksanu:128: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syād iti sattvam anaikāntikam /
SA15ratksanu:130: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:133: (81.2) kiṃ ca na bhūtalavad atrākṣaṇiko dharmi dṛśyate /
SA15ratksanu:134: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasya cit dṛśyasya pratipattim antareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
SA15ratksanu:137: ubhayadharmatve cānaikāntikatvam iti na trayīṃ doṣajātim atipatati /
SA15ratksanu:138: (81.6) yat punar uktam akṣaṇikatve kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhād iti /
SA15ratksanu:139: tatra virodhasiddhim anusaratā virodhy api pratipattavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:142: (81.8) pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sann eva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:144: saṃvṛtisiddham api vāstavaṃ kālpanikaṃ vā syāt /
SA15ratksanu:155: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjalir iti /
SA15ratksanu:157: (81.18) nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15ratksanu:158: śūnyaṃ ca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakṣā kramāder api /
SA15ratksanu:160: (81.23) atrocyate / iha vastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi gotvam,
SA15ratksanu:162: avastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo vandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
SA15ratksanu:163: tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti /
SA15ratksanu:168: (81.28) dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:169: (82.1) avastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvasya vyāpakasyābhāvād āśrayāsiddhidūṣaṇasyānupanyāsaprasaṅga ity arthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:172: paraṃ tu pratiṣidhyata iti vyaktam idam īśvaraceṣṭitam /
SA15ratksanu:173: tathā hy avastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kim avastuni vidhīyata,
SA15ratksanu:175: na vā kva cid apīti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15ratksanu:180: (82.8) tṛtīyas tu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvād iti katham avastuno dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:181: tasmād yathā pramāṇopanyāsaḥ prameyatvasvīkāra pūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ,
SA15ratksanu:182: vācakaśabdopanyāso vā vācyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptas tathā 'vastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:184: (82.11) tad yadi vacanopanyāso vyāpyadharmas tadā 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkāro 'pi vyāpakadharmo durvāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:186: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balād āyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:188: na hy abruvan paraṃ bodhayitum īśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:189: [a]bruvan vā doṣam imaṃ parihartum iti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:190: (82.17) avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyate iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:192: avastuprastāve svayam eva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāyayā niḥsartum icchati /
SA15ratksanu:193: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedhuṃ śakṣate /
SA15ratksanu:194: tataś cātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate /
SA15ratksanu:202: svavacanasyānupanyāsaprasaṅgād ity akṣaṇikasyābhāve sandehe 'pi vā 'vastudharmeṇa dharmitvam avyāhatam iti nāyam āśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:205: kevalam asau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratītir vastvavastunor ekarūpā na bhavati /
SA15ratksanu:207: yathā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi ca vikalpaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:208: avastunas tu sāmarthyābhāvād vikalpamātram eva pratītiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:209: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratītir yathā sākṣāt pratyakṣam,
SA15ratksanu:213: (83.4) na hy abhāvah kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:214: sa ca vyavahāro vikalpād api sidhyaty eva /
SA15ratksanu:215: anyathā sarvajanaprasiddho 'vastuvyavahāro na syāt / iṣyate ca /
SA15ratksanu:216: (83.6) taddharmitvapratiṣedhānubandhād ity akāmenāpi vikalpamātrasiddho 'kṣaṇikaḥ svīkartavya iti nāyam apratītatvād apy āśrayāsiddho hetur vaktavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:218: (83.9) na kaś cid dhetur anāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvād iti /
SA15ratksanu:220: vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmeṇa dharmitvāyogāt /
SA15ratksanu:222: (83.11) yathā ātmano vibhutvasādhanārtham upanyastaṃ sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti sādhanam /
SA15ratksanu:225: samarthite tu hetāv avastuka iti brūmaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:232: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntasyāpi vyomotpalāder dharmitvaṃ vikalpamātreṇa pratītiś cāvagantavyā /
SA15ratksanu:233: tad evam avastudharmāpekṣayā 'vastunodharmitvasya vikalpamātreṇa pratīteś cāpahnotum aśakyatvān nāyam āśrayāsiddho hetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:237: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyam asti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyam api (?)
SA15ratksanu:242: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15ratksanu:243: sahakārisahitād eva tataḥ kāryotpattidarsanāt iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:244: (83.24) yadā tāvad amī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam eṣām astu ko niṣeddhā /
SA15ratksanu:245: militair eva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyam iti kuto labhyate /
SA15ratksanu:248: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā naikaṃ janakam iti sthiravādināṃ manorājyasyāpy aviṣayaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:249: (83.29) kiṃ kurmo dṛśyate tāvad evam iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:250: dṛśyatāṃ kiṃ tu pūrvasthitād eva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattir anyasmād eva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇād iti vivādapadam etat /
SA15ratksanu:251: tatra prāg api sambhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattir na vā kadā cid apīti virodham asamādhāya tad eva kāryotpattir iti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpām arhati /
SA15ratksanu:254: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇam asmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditam iti tad evāvadhāryam /
SA15ratksanu:257: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaraṃ,
SA15ratksanu:258: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvam iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:260: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
SA15ratksanu:265: (84.11) na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktam,
SA15ratksanu:267: hetuś ca sann api yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti,
SA15ratksanu:268: tadā tatkāryam eva tan na syāt /
SA15ratksanu:273: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
SA15ratksanu:275: sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālam evedaṃ na pūrvakālam iti kuta etat /
SA15ratksanu:276: tadabhāvāc ca kāraṇam apy uttarakāryasvabhāvam ity api kutaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:277: (84.17) kiṃ kurmaḥ / uttarakālam eva tasya janmeti cet /
SA15ratksanu:279: sthiratve 'py eṣa eva svabhāvas tasya yad uttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti cet /
SA15ratksanu:280: na, pramāṇabādhite svabhāvābhyupagamāyogād iti na tāvad akṣaṇikasya kramikāryakāritvam asti /
SA15ratksanu:282: dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe kārakasvarūpasadbhāve punar api kāryakaraṇaprasaṅgāt /
SA15ratksanu:283: (84.21) kārye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvād ūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayed iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:284: na, sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayor api sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvam avadhāryam iti prāg eva pratipādanāt /
SA15ratksanu:285: kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartum aśakyatvam eva kāraṇam asamartham āvedayati /
SA15ratksanu:286: (84.23) tad ayam akṣaṇike kramākramikāryakāritvābhāvo na siddhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:287: na ca kramākramābhyām aparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyām avyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:292: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatve 'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣād eva sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:293: evaṃ kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam iti kramākramayor anyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvād etat prakāradvayaparihāreṇārthākriyakāritvam anyatra na gatam ity arthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:298: na hy abhāvaḥ kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣatkartavyaḥ,
SA15ratksanu:300: na hy abhāvasya vikalpād anyāpratipattir apratipattir vā sarvathā /
SA15ratksanu:302: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpād eva pratipattiḥ.4 /
SA15ratksanu:304: vyāpakānupalambhena nirdoṣeṇa sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāpter avyāhatatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:306: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ ca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvād iti sthitam /
SA15ratksanu:307: (85.13) nanu vyāpakānupalabdhir iti yady anupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvam avastutvāt /
SA15ratksanu:308: na cānyopalabdhir vyāpakānupalabdhir abhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivad anyasya kasya cid anupalabdher iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:311: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvād ity atra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir vṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:312: śiṃśapāpeksayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir eva śiṃśapāyā abhāvopalabdhir iti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:313: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇād eva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:314: arthakriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītir evārthakriyāyoga pratītir iti vyāpakānupalambhāntarād asya na kaś cid viśeṣaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:315: (85.22) adhyavasāyāpekṣayā ca bāhye 'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:316: adhyavasāyaś ca samanantarapratyayabalād āyātākāraviśeṣayogād agṛhīte 'pi pravartanaśaktir bodhavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:321: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathā 'vastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:322: (85.27) tathā hy ekajñānasaṃsargy atra vikalpya eva /
SA15ratksanu:324: śaśaśirasy api tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasambhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate,
SA15ratksanu:325: tathā nīlādāv apariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdham ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau,
SA15ratksanu:326: yadi nitye bhavataḥ nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātām iti sambhāvanaya ekājñānasaṃsargadvārakam eva pratiṣidhyate /
SA15ratksanu:327_0: kathaṃ punar etasmin nityajñāne kramākramayor asphuraṇam iti yāvatā kramākramakroḍikṛtam
SA15ratksanu:327_1: eva nityaṃ vikalpayām iti cet. ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropam antareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt.
SA15ratksanu:328_0: (86.6) kālāntare 'py ekarūpatayā nityatvam. kramākramau ca kṣaṇadvaye bhinnarūpatayā.
SA15ratksanu:328_1: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteś ca parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā durvāro
SA15ratksanu:328_2: virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayor antarbhāvaḥ. anantarbhāvāc ca suddhanityavikalpena
SA15ratksanu:328_3: dūrīkṛtakramākramasamāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ. tataś ca pratiyogini nitye 'pi vikalpyamāne
SA15ratksanu:328_5: kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ. tata eva cārthakriyāśakter anupalabdhiḥ. tasmād vyāpakavivekidharmyupalabdhitayā
SA15ratksanu:329: (86.13) nanv etad avastudharmikopayogi vastv adhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet. kim idaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānatvam nāma. kiṃ paramparayāpi vastunaḥ sakāśād āgatatvam,
SA15ratksanu:330: atha vastuni kena cid ākāreṇa vyavahārakāraṇatvam,
SA15ratksanu:332: (86.16) yady ādyaḥ pakṣas tadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāś ca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastupratibaddhatvam asyāpi. na kṣīṇam.
SA15ratksanu:333: (86.18) na dvitīye 'pi pakṣe dosah sambhavati. kṣaṇabhaṅgivastu sādhanopāyatvād asya.
SA15ratksanu:334_0: (86.19) na cāntimo 'pi vikalpaḥ kalpyate. tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno dharmibhūtasya
SA15ratksanu:335: (86.23) ayam eva nyāyo na vaktā vandhyāsutaś caitanyābhāvād ityādau yojyaḥ. etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādir antarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyam iti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:336: (86.25) na ca kramādyabhāvas trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātikrāmati,
SA15ratksanu:338: (86.26) yat tvanena pramāṇāntarān nityānām asattvasiddhau kramādivirahasyābhāvadharmatā sidhyatīty uktam,
SA15ratksanu:339_0: tadvālasyāpi durabhidhānam. nityo hi dharmi. asattvaṃ sādhyam. kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvaviraho
SA15ratksanu:339_1: hetuḥ. asya cābhāvadharmatvaṃ nāma asattvalakṣaṇasvasādhyāvinābhāvitvam ucyate. tac
SA15ratksanu:339_2: ca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
SA15ratksanu:339_3: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatīty abhāvadharmatvaṃ prāg eva vidhyor vyāptisādhanāt
SA15ratksanu:339_4: pratyakṣād anumānād ekasmād vā pramāṇāntarāt siddham iti netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:340: (87.7) na ca sattāyām ivāsattāyām api tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt. vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca. tayor dharmy api vastv eva yujyate.
SA15ratksanu:341_0: (87.9) vastunas tu pratyakṣānumānābhyām eva siddhiḥ. tayor abhāve niyamenāśrayāsiddhir
SA15ratksanu:341_1: iti yuktam. asattāsādhane tv avastudharmo hetur avastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi
SA15ratksanu:341_2: nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ. tathā 'kṣaṇikasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhaḥ sidhyaty eva.
SA15ratksanu:342_0: (87.13) tathā vikalpādevākṣaṇiko virodhī siddhaḥ. vikalpollikhitaś cāsya svabhāvo
SA15ratksanu:342_1: nāpara ity api vyavahartavyam. anyathā tadanuvādena kramākramādirahitatvādiniṣedhādikam
SA15ratksanu:342_3: asti ca. ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasiddhasya vandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho
SA15ratksanu:342_4: 'nurūpas tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tad eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ
SA15ratksanu:342_5: kīdṛso doṣaḥ syāt. yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvāt virodhapratiṣedhas tarhi vandhyāputrādyanubhavād
SA15ratksanu:343: (87.20) nanv evaṃ virodhasyāpāramārthikatvam. taddvāreṇa kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy apāramārthikī syād iti cet.
SA15ratksanu:344: (87.21) na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādasambandhābhidhānam iṣyate,
SA15ratksanu:345: 'smābhir upapadyate vā. yenaikasambandhino vastutvābhāve 'pāramārthikaṃ syāt. yathā tv iṣyate tathā pāramārthika eva /
SA15ratksanu:349: nāpy abhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yam anayor asaṃkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /

SA15ratksanu:362: śūnyaś ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā 'sattā 'pi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakyā kramāder api / iti /

SA15ratksanu:366: (88.17) tad vam nityaṃ na kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvayogīti paramārthaḥ /
